Project Overseer Documentation

Welcome to the official documentation of Project Overseer, a set of development tools for developing smart farming and gardening solutions. If you are new to this project, we suggest heading to the Introduction section of this documentation in order to get an idea on what Project Overseer is capable of.

You may access the content of this documentation through this page. You may also access the sections of this project's documentation through the navigation bar on the left.

If you prefer reading he documentation offline, you can download this PDF copy of the documentation. Please note that the PDF copy will be updated every time a new update for Project Overseer is released.

Here are the contents of this documentation:

  • Introduction
  • Supported Hardware
  • List of Features
  • Extensions
  • Frequently Asked Questions
  • Development Status
  • Contributions
  • Components
  • License
